alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 5:35PM MST until August 21 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 615 PM MST. * At 535 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gold Canyon, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, East Mesa, Gold Canyon, Granite Reef Dam, Gold Camp, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Superstition Springs Mall, Saguaro Lake, and Canyon Lake. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 186 and 210. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 178 and 202. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 14 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
